entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 2:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -30.6°C
Wind: W 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
